comments:
Description:
Drag to change xtab width will cause xls preview failure
Build number:2.2.0.v20070615

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a xtab.
2. Use mouse drag to change xtab column width.
3. Preview in xls prototype

Expected result:
Display xtab content.

Actual result:
IllegalArgumentException and preview fail.

Error log:
- org.eclipse.birt.report.service.api.ReportServiceException: Error happened while running the report; nested exception is:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: "fromUnits"must be one of the absolute units(CM, IN, MM, PT).
